mapper.select: SELECT s.suber_no AS suberNo, s.company_name AS subName, LISTAGG(m.module_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY m.module_name) AS moduleName, p.payment_status AS paymentStatus, TO_CHAR(p.payment_end_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS paymentEndDate FROM suber s LEFT JOIN sub_details sd ON s.suber_no = sd.suber_no LEFT JOIN module m ON sd.module_no = m.module_no LEFT JOIN payment p ON s.suber_no = p.suber_no GROUP BY s.suber_no, s.company_name, p.payment_status, p.payment_end_date ORDER BY s.suber_no DESC

WITH pd_ranked AS ( SELECT pd.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pd.payment_no ORDER BY pd.payment_details_no) AS rn FROM payment_details pd ), sd_ranked AS ( SELECT sd.*, m.module_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY sd.suber_no ORDER BY sd.module_no) AS rn FROM sub_details sd JOIN module m ON sd.module_no = m.module_no ), main_query AS ( SELECT s.company_name, s.suber_no, NVL(pd.payment_price, 0) AS payment_price, p.payment_start_date, p.payment_end_date, NVL(sd.module_name, '기본모듈 구독중') AS module_name, s.MAX_UP_SIZE, s.MAX_SIZE, s.MAX_COUNT FROM suber s LEFT JOIN payment p ON s.suber_no = p.suber_no LEFT JOIN pd_ranked pd ON p.payment_no = pd.payment_no LEFT JOIN sd_ranked sd ON s.suber_no = sd.suber_no AND pd.rn = sd.rn WHERE s.suber_no = #{suberNo} ) SELECT * FROM main_query ORDER BY module_name
mapper.update: UPDATE suber SET sub_pw = #{subPw}, sub_name = #{subName}, sub_email = #{subEmail}, sub_bnis_no = #{subBnisNo}, company_name = #{companyName}, first_ip = #{firstIp}, second_ip = #{secondIp}, max_count = #{maxCount}, max_size = #{maxSize}, max_up_size = #{maxUpSize} WHERE suber_no = #{suberNo}
